name: MKT MediaStats API
description: AI-driven narrative analysis of media and behavioral data for investment insights, providing global market coverage including stocks, FX, fixed income, and crypto with enterprise-only access.

endpoints.description: AI-driven narrative analysis of media and behavioral data
endpoints.response_format: JSON with narrative insights and behavioral indicators

content_summary.geographic_scope: Global markets including stocks, FX, fixed income, crypto

research_notes.api_summary: MKT MediaStats provides AI-driven narrative analysis for institutional clients with no public API documentation found. Requires direct vendor contact for access and integration details.

name: FinBrain Technologies API
description: AI-powered stock predictions and sentiment analysis platform providing technical indicators, earnings analysis, and risk signals for 10,000+ global stocks with Python SDK available.

endpoints.description: AI-powered stock price predictions with confidence scores
endpoints.response_format: JSON with prediction values and confidence metrics

endpoints.description: Sentiment analysis and social media indicators
endpoints.response_format: JSON with sentiment scores and social indicators

content_summary.update_frequency: Multiple timeframes with extensive historical data

research_notes.api_summary: FinBrain provides AI-powered stock predictions with comprehensive documentation, Python SDK availability, and clear pricing structure covering 10,000+ global stocks with multiple prediction timeframes.

name: Prattle Analytics API (Discontinued)
description: Former central bank communication sentiment analysis platform. Service discontinued as independent offering after acquisition by Liquidnet in 2019. Access only through Liquidnet platform for institutional clients.

access_info.pricing_model: Service discontinued - access only through Liquidnet platform

content_summary.geographic_scope: Formerly covered 15 central banks, 3,000+ US companies

research_notes.api_summary: Prattle Analytics was acquired by Liquidnet in 2019 and is no longer available as independent API service. Former services included central bank communication sentiment analysis covering 15 central banks and 3,000+ US companies.

name: Geoquant API (Identity Unclear)
description: No specific company named 'Geoquant' clearly identified. Multiple geospatial API providers offer similar services including climate risk data, geocoding, and spatial analysis. Requires clarification of specific company and requirements.

research_notes.api_summary: No specific company named 'Geoquant' clearly identified. Multiple geospatial API providers exist with similar services. Need clarification of specific company and requirements for accurate API documentation.

name: PredictIt API
description: Political prediction markets API providing real-time data on election betting, current events, and political forecasting with free access and no authentication required.

access_info.pricing_model: Completely free with no authentication required

endpoints.description: All available prediction markets with current prices
endpoints.response_format: JSON with all markets and contract prices

endpoints.description: Specific market data by market ID
endpoints.response_format: JSON with specific market details and contracts

content_summary.geographic_scope: Primarily US political events with some international coverage

research_notes.api_summary: PredictIt offers completely free API access to political prediction markets with no authentication required. Well-documented with multiple client libraries available and immediate integration capability.
